scenario.name: Sipwise NGCP Benchmark UAS Responder
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=0]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=0] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=0]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=0]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=0]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=0]> Call-ID: NGCP%[field4 file="callee.csv" line=0]%///[call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: * Expires: 0 Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

REGISTER sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=0]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=0] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=0]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=0]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=0]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=0]> Call-ID: NGCP%[field4 file="callee.csv" line=0]%///[call_id] CSeq: 2 REGISTER [field2 file="callee.csv" line=0] Contact: * Expires: 0 Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
